profile.greeting: Welcome {{userFirstName}}. I am the virtual assistant for CairoScan services

get_started.welcome: "Hello {{userFirstName}}! Welcome to Original Coast Clothing, where you can find clothing styles for every occasion.
get_started.menu: You can use the menu below
get_started.help: What service do you need assistance with today?

names_Radiology.message:
To know the prices for Radiology and booking
Choose from the menu below

prices_Radiology.CT_Coronary:
Before the scan, fasting for 6 hours + kidney function test + attendance with previous examinations
Price: 4200 EGP
prices_Radiology.MRI_Heart:
Before the scan, you must do a kidney function test creatinine
Price: 5300 EGP
prices_Radiology.visit_branch: Book a visit at the branch

order.prompt: We are happy to assist you. Choose from the following
order.number: Certainly, please write the order number
order.status: Your order is on its way to you, expected to arrive within 3 days.

care.prompt: To connect you with the right team, please let me know what you need?
care.appointment: Thank you for wanting to schedule an appointment
care.issue: Hello {{userFirstName}}, let me introduce myself, I am {{agentFirstName}}, and I am here to help you with any questions about {{topic}}.
care.default: Hello {{userFirstName}}, let me introduce myself, I am {{agentFirstName}}, and I am here to help you today. How can I assist you?
care.style: Hello {{userFirstName}}, let me introduce myself, I am {{agentFirstName}}, and I am here to answer any questions you have about the summer models we offer
care.end: This is the most the trial can offer. You can leverage the capabilities of the Messenger platform in your business. Please visit https://fb.me/get-sample-oc to learn how to create a similar experience

survey.prompt: Hello, would you like quick feedback on your recent experience with {{agentFirstName}}?
survey.neutral: Thank you for the feedback, and if there's anything we should improve, feel free to comment using the hashtag #suggestion
survey.negative: Thank you for letting us know. We're sorry to hear that. If there's anything we can do to change what happened, please let us know

chat_plugin.prompt: Thank you for visiting our store, make sure to check out all the fantastic styles we have in the summer section.

fallback.attachment: Thank you for sending this attachment. We can connect you with one of the agents to review it, or we can start over

branches.greeting: Please choose the nearest branch for you..

common.title: Choose Yes or No from the menu below

questions.contract: Is there insurance or a contract?
questions.bookVisit: Do you want to book a visit at the branch?
questions.bookHomeVisit: Do you want to book a home visit?

customer_service.redirection: You have been redirected to our customer service, please wait...

complaints.submit: Please, Submit your complaint and you'll be redirected to our customer service

radiology_results.enquire: Please, Type in the name and the number that was used to fill the data and you'll be redirected to our customer service

test_results.enquire: Please, Type in the name and the number that was used to fill the data and you'll be redirected to our customer service

home_visit.submit: Please, Type in the name and the number and you'll be redirected to our customer service
